name: Sonar Salvage
overview: A more complicated strategy game. You are in charge of a salvage / recovery company on a small island in the Caribbean Sea. Each day you hire frogmen, deep sea divers and equipment to explore the sea bed. With the use of you instruments (depth/fuel and sonar) you search for sunken treasures. The finance for these expensive operations is found by selling the relics and treasures you have recovered to local museums, auction rooms and private collectors. Your search is not easy - the sea bed is a no-mans land!
